Classes

union  inf

Detailed Description

Implements AES encryption and decryption.

The supported key lengths are: 128-bit, 192-bit and 256-bit.

See also:
Encryption Methods: How to Best Protect Your Data

Definition at line 84 of file Aes.h.

CAes::CAes ( char *  pKey,
UINT  uSize,
bool  bEncryption 
)

Initializes a new instance of the CAes class.

Parameters:
[in] pKey The key to use.
uSize The size of pKey in bytes. Valid values are: 16, 24 or 32.
bEncryption true if initialization is for encryption, false - for decryption.
Exceptions:
CZipException with the CZipException::generic code, if uSize is invalid.

UINT  uSize

Encrypts or decrypts a data block of a given size.
